name: DCT
description: Roboton(DCT) is a TRC20 utility token built on the TRON blockchain, designed to power a hybrid ecosystem of GameFi, DeFi, and Web3 applications. With ~3-second block times and ultra-low transaction fees, DCT ensures scalable, secure, and user-friendly interactions. The token fuels Robotonâ€™s unique Battle-to-Earn and Tab-to-Earn systems, where users can fight in real-time battles, complete in-app actions, and earn on-chain rewards. Beyond gaming, DCT provides staking for passive income, governance for DAO voting, and utility across DeFi platforms, NFT marketplaces, and cross-chain bridges. The project has already attracted a vibrant community with 35K+ Twitter followers, 60K+ Telegram members, and 190K+ active mini-game bot users. Strategic partnerships with OKX Wallet, TimeFarm, RewardsHQ, World3, and more than 20 additional partners strengthen its adoption. With a fixed supply of 50B tokens, transparent tokenomics, and upcoming audits by CertiK and SlowMist, Roboton is positioned to become a core utility token for the next generation of decentralized ecosystems, empowering both developers and everyday users.
